names.english: licorice and aconite accessory root decoction
names.commonEnglish: Licorice and Aconite Accessory Root Decoction

actions: Tonifies the Spleen and augments Q,alleviates pain and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Warms Ming Men Fire, assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang, disperses Cold and Dampness, warms the channels and stops pain.
With Bai Zhu, for Wind-Damp Bi.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness, promotes water metabolism, stabilizes the Exterior and stops sweating.
Releases the exterior, assists Yang, warms the channels and collaterals to relieve pain and warms and facilitates the flow of Qi through the channels and collaterals and Blood through the vessels.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for chills, painful extremities and due to Yang Deficiency with Wind-Cold-Damp Bi and backache due to Wind-Cold Damp Bi.

syndromes: Deep-seated pains in the bones and joints due to Wind-Damp

symptoms: Deep-seated pains in the bones and joints
A disinclination to take off one's clothes
